page.title: 14WEST READING CARNIVAL
page.content: This year our school chose "WIZARD OF OZ" as our theme. I went as Dorothy.I wore a flared pink dress and red shoes.Onthe front of the float we had a coloured rainbow with birds flying over it.We waited outside the cattle market,Great Knollys Street,for the other floats and the police.And all the time it was raining!we set off like drowned rats but we didn't mind. {The carnival queen}didn't mind either. We went down roads in West Reading and all the time people were waiting and taking photographs.The steel bands played and everyone blew whistles as loud as they could so they nearly deafend you.We went along the Oxford Road to the big roundabout.We danced until we got to Wilson Road and we still could hear the music playing. {Lorraine Dance, Wilson school
